courseName: Digital Hospitality and Travel Leadership - MSc
facultyName: London Geller College of Hospitality and Tourism
description: The global tourism industry is the seventh fastest-growing industry in the world, with the hospitality sector alone worth Â£2.5 trillion to the global economy.This course has been developed in consultation with the industry and offers a fascinating insight into the continuously changing arena of digital hospitality and travel services.Finding the connections between leadership and digital disruption is not easy and involves a radical transformation of organisations in the sector. These three key themes - leadership, digital disruption and transformation - form the foundation for this course.
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
